meanings.definition: A person who deceives or betrays a friend or colleague.
meanings.sent1: I can't believe my friend turned out to be a backstabber.
meanings.sent2: The backstabber pretended to be loyal while secretly plotting against us.
meanings.sent3: The backstabber thought they could fool everyone, but their true colors were revealed.
meanings.sent4: The backstabber's actions cut deeper than any physical wound.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the backstabber lurking in the shadows of friendship.

meanings.definition: To betray someone's trust or confidence.
meanings.sent1: She backstabber her best friend by spreading rumors behind her back.
meanings.sent2: I never expected him to backstabber me like that after all we've been through.
meanings.sent3: He tried to backstabber his way to the top, but karma caught up with him.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal stung like a thousand backstabbers in the heart.
meanings.sent5: The decision to backstabber will always leave a mark on your conscience.
